name: G Golem Invalid Dolmen
desc:
2+ EARTH monsters
Your co-linked monsters are unaffected by monster effects activated on your opponent's field. Your opponent's monsters must attack this card, if able. Once per turn: You can discard 1 Cyberse monster; draw 1 card. If this co-linked card is destroyed: You can negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls.
